name: CHAN Lok Shun Apple
research interest: Dr Chan has had a number of years devoted to the study of building energy analysis and conservation opportunities in Hong Kong, as a response to the Hong Kong SAR Government in promoting energy conservation in buildings.
Currently, his research work primarily focuses on two major areas with impact on public policy development.
(i) Meteorological Data Development for Building Energy Simulation
(ii) Energy-Efficient Building Design through Legislative Control
